DOC.brief_summary: Primary endpoint : To evaluate predictive value plasmatic level Neutrophil Gelatinase Associated Lipocalin ( NGAL ) reveal acute kidney failure cardiac surgery patient preoperative chronic kidney failure Secondary endpoint obtain threshold value NGAL .
DOC.brief_title: NGAL Predictive Value Acute Kidney Failure After Cardiac Surgery Patients With Preoperative Chronic Kidney Failure
DOC.criteria: Renal clearance le 60 mL/min Able give write consent Elective valve surgery Elective CABG surgery Less 18 year old Iodine injection within 3 day surgery Iodine injection within 24 first postoperative hour preoperative infection evolutive cancer disease Refusal Pregnancy Unable give write consent
